content: I've been carpooling with my colleague, Rachel, on Thursdays for the past six weeks, and we often grab coffee together before work. I think a reusable coffee cup would be a great addition to our commuting routine. I'm leaning towards a glass cup, but I'm concerned about the fragility. Do you think a glass cup would be a good choice for daily commuting, or should I opt for a stainless steel cup instead?
